examples.description: returns an array of all ingredients belonging to a recipe
examples.full_description: Ingredients GET /recipes/:recipe_id/ingredients returns an array of all ingredients belonging to a recipe

examples.description: returns a 404 response if the recipe is not found
examples.full_description: Ingredients GET /recipes/:recipe_id/ingredients returns a 404 response if the recipe is not found

examples.description: returns the ingredient with the matching id
examples.full_description: Ingredients GET /recipes/:recipe_id/ingredients/:id returns the ingredient with the matching id

examples.description: returns a 404 response if the ingredient is not found
examples.full_description: Ingredients GET /recipes/:recipe_id/ingredients/:id returns a 404 response if the ingredient is not found

examples.description: creates a new ingredient belonging to a recipe
examples.full_description: Ingredients POST /recipes/:recipe_id/ingredients creates a new ingredient belonging to a recipe
Ingredients POST /recipes/:recipe_id/ingredients returns the newly created ingredient

examples.description: returns a 201 created status if the ingredient was created
examples.full_description: Ingredients POST /recipes/:recipe_id/ingredients returns a 201 created status if the ingredient was created

examples.description: returns a 404 response if the recipe is not found
examples.full_description: Ingredients POST /recipes/:recipe_id/ingredients returns a 404 response if the recipe is not found

examples.description: returns an array of all ingredients with recipe info
examples.full_description: Ingredients GET /ingredients returns an array of all ingredients with recipe info

examples.description: returns a recipe with an array of all ingredients associated with that recipe
examples.full_description: Recipes GET /recipes/:id returns a recipe with an array of all ingredients associated with that recipe
